#summary table(name)
#labels api,1.0

*Category*:

[ModelInitializationFunctions Model Initialization Functions]

*Description*:

Use this method to tell Wheels what database table to connect to for this model. You only need to use this method when your table naming does not follow the standard Wheels conventions of a singular object name mapping to a plural table name (i.e. `User.cfc` mapping to the table `users` for example).

*Return Type*:

Void

*History*:

-

*Parameters*:

|| *Name* || *Type* || *Required* || *Default* || *Description* ||
|| *name* || string || true || - || Name of the table to map this model to ||

*Examples*:

{{{
<!--- in models/User.cfc --->
<cffunction name="init">
  <cfset table("mycorp_USERS")>
</cffunction>
}}}
